name: df-nsg
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5
body: |- wceq(cnsg, cmpt(s0, cgrp, crab(s1, cfv(csubg, cv(s0)), wsbc(s2, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), wsbc(s3, cfv(cplusg, cv(s0)), wral(s4, cv(s2), wral(s5, cv(s2), wb(wcel(co(cv(s4), cv(s3), cv(s5)), cv(s1)), wcel(co(cv(s5), cv(s3), cv(s4)), cv(s1))))))))))
comment: Define the equivalence relation in a quotient ring or quotient group (where ` i ` is a two-sided ideal or a normal subgroup). For non-normal subgroups this generates the left cosets. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Jun-2015.)
